New Records: Mitchell Santner took 5 wickets for 59 runs in the match
Key Match Events: Mitchell Santner dismissed opener Max O'Dowd, Colin Ackermann, and Netherlands skipper Scott Edwards
Matt Henry took 3 wickets and bowled out Aryan Dutt, securing a 99-run win for New Zealand
Devon Conway made a low catch to dismiss Sybrand Engelbrecht
Colin Ackermann scored 69 runs and Teja Nidamanuru scored 21 runs for Netherlands
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand's Mitch Santner, third left without cap, celebrates the wicket of Netherlands' Roelof Van Der Merwe
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand's Mitchell Santner is chosen as the Player of the match for grabbing crucial 5 wickets during the match
New Zealand won the match by 99 runs, keeping them on top of the points table
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands have followed the currently undeclared norm and entered the Cricket World Cup 2023 with deep batting
New Zealand's strong batting was not looking that effective against Netherlands
Others: Trent Boult's pace was dangerous in the match against Netherlands
Rachin Ravindra's magical bowling spell was a great asset for the New Zealand team
